results.title: Exenatide and Metformin Improve Serum Indices and Intestinal Flora in patients with Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus and Non-Alcoholic Fatty Liver Disease.
results.text_hl: The aim of the study was to investigate th e in flue nce of @CHEMICAL_Exenatide @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077270 @@@Exenatide@@@ comb ined with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Met formin@@@ on fasti ng blood @CHEMICAL_Glucose @CHEMICAL_MESH:D005947 @@@glucose@@@, postpr andial @CHEMICAL_Glucose @CHEMICAL_MESH:D005947 @@@glucose@@@, @CHEMICAL_Triglycerides @CHEMICAL_MESH:D014280 @@@triglycerides@@@, total @CHEMICAL_Cholesterol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002784 @@@cholesterol@@@, @GENE_GPT @GENE_2875 @@@alanine aminotransferase@@@, aspartate aminotransferase, and inte s tinal flora in typ e 2 @<m>DISEASE_Lipoid_Proteinosis_of_Urbach_and_Wiethe</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008065 @@@diab etes mellitus@@@ cases with @DISEASE_Non_alcoholic_Fatty_Liver_Disease @DISEASE_MESH:D065626 @@@non-alcoholic fatty liver disease@@@.
